alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Gogebic; Houghton; Iron; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 8:16AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Iron, southeastern Gogebic, southwestern Houghton, eastern Ontonagon and Baraga Counties through 900 AM EDT/800 AM CDT/... At 816 AM EDT/716 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Nisula to near Kenton to near Marenisco. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Kenton around 820 AM EDT. Nisula around 825 AM EDT. Sidnaw around 835 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Baraga, Keweenaw Bay, U.S. 141 between Covington and Amasa, L`anse and Watersmeet. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baraga; Gogebic; Houghton; Iron; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton
